attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Home Office Minister Baroness Scotland said in relation to this legislation. "We are hitting criminals in the pocket to make sure that crime doesn't pay and victims continue to get the services we all want them to have". What on earth is this all about, Suddenly everyone who goes over the speed limit by a few miles an hour is a criminal, and has to pay to help their victims? Who is this government trying to kid, What victims? This is another tax and assault on drivers and our freedom. This country is in real trouble and getting worse by the day.
